alert.note: Alert for Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 4:42PM CDT until September 13 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Orange County in southeastern Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 441 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vidor, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Orange, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Mauriceville, Rose City, Pine Forest, Pinehurst, and Orangefield. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 858. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
